name: All Elephants go to Heaven
description:
For Oculus Rift S

Only four elephants remain due to poaching and you have been tasked with ensuring that the species does not go extinct. To do this you must use your magical bow and a variety of special arrows. You’ve been at this for a long time but you're not done yet. 

P.S. - Rest assured that the irony of shooting an animal to save it is not lost on us 

Gameplay 

  • This is an endless wave-based VR game where your target is to achieve the best score on the leaderboard 
  • Developed and tested on the Oculus Rift S and Oculus Quest (using Oculus Link) 
  • You score points by hitting the falling elephants with your magical arrows that will save it from falling 
  • When 3 elephants reach the ground it’s game over 
  • You get 10 special arrows by shooting the power up drops that come from saved elephants 
  • Types of special arrow
    • Burst arrow (3 and 5 arrow variations) - extra arrows that are launched behind the fired arrow, power-up colored green 
    • Volley arrow (3 and 5 arrow variations) - extra arrows that are launched at an angle around the original arrow, power-up colored blue 
    • Homing arrow – arrow homes in on the closest elephant in the arrow's trajectory, power-up colored pink

Controls 

  • Movement – Right Controller thumbstick (movement direction based on controller orientation) 
  • Turn - Left Controller thumbstick  left/right 
  • Enable menu interaction laser – Left controller Y/Right Controller B 
  • Menu interact – Controller Trigger 
  • Grab – Controller Grab button (release to fire) (Grab bow handle to switch bow hand, grab bow string to draw bow)
